title: Completes
description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

@id.description: The unique identifier of this metric.

schema:name.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:measurement.description: How to take measures of this metric.
